name: ESOL – Advanced 3 Academic English, Listening & Speaking for Undergraduates
description: Course Description: Not for academic credit.  English as a Second Language for non-native speakers.  For students planning to pursue an undergraduate degree.  Improve listening comprehension using Level 3 texts; communicate with increasing fluency and accuracy about ideas from course themes.
prerequisite: Prerequisite:  (AEIN 8210 with a minimum grade of S) and (AEIN 8212 with a minimum grade of S) and (AEIN 8213 with a minimum grade of S) and (AEIN 8255 with a minimum grade of S).
column11: Restrictions: Must major/minor in: PLACE Academic English. Must be a: Self Improvement.
column12: Registration Information: Concurrent registration in AEAD 8312 and AEAD 8313.

name: ESOL – Advanced 3 Academic English, Reading & Writing for Undergraduates
description: Course Description: Not for academic credit.  English as a Second Language for non-native speakers.  For students planning to pursue an undergraduate degree.  Improve reading comprehension using Level 3 texts; complete well-developed and organized Level 3 writing tasks about ideas from course themes.
prerequisite: Prerequisite:  (AEIN 8210 with a minimum grade of S) and (AEIN 8212 with a minimum grade of S) and (AEIN 8213 with a minimum grade of S) and (AEIN 8255 with a minimum grade of S).
column11: Restrictions: Must major/minor in: PLACE Academic English. Must be a: Self Improvement.
column12: Registration Information: Concurrent registration in AEAD 8310 and AEAD 8313.

name: ESOL – Advanced 3 Academic English, Grammar for Undergraduates
description: Course Description: Not for academic credit.  English as a Second Language for non-native speakers.  For students planning to pursue an undergraduate degree.  Focus on grammatical structures present in Level 3 reading and listening texts; incorporate learned grammatical structures in Level 3 writing and speaking tasks.
prerequisite: Prerequisite:  (AEIN 8210 with a minimum grade of S) and (AEIN 8212 with a minimum grade of S) and (AEIN 8213 with a minimum grade of S) and (AEIN 8255 with a minimum grade of S).
column11: Restrictions: Must major/minor in: PLACE Academic English. Must be a: Self Improvement.
column12: Registration Information: Concurrent registration in AEAD 8310 and AEAD 8312.

name: ESOL – Advanced 3 Academic English, General Non-Core for Undergraduates
description: Course Description: Not for academic credit. English as a Second Language for non-native speakers. For students planning to pursue an undergraduate degree. Introduce and review technology tools and independent language learning strategies to support language skill development.
prerequisite: Prerequisite:  AEAD 8310 to 8313 with a minimum grade of S++ - at least 1 course, may be taken concurrently.
column11: Restrictions: Must major/minor in: PLACE Academic English. Must be a: Self Improvement.
